article.author: Celebrity Cruises®
article.title: We Can't Wait to Welcome You On Board Again
article.lead: Just like you, we’re dreaming of seeing new shorelines on the horizon. Experiencing new cultures and savoring new flavors. Meeting people far and wide and realizing we aren’t so different after all. And the moment these dreams can become reality, Celebrity will be ready to welcome you back. Until then, the world is changing, and they’re changing with it. They’re taking every step to ensure you and the crew stay healthy and safe when you set sail. That’s Celebrity’s top priority—so that enjoying your vacation can be yours.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/g5hLPMvTVAo?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Sunwing
article.title: Introducing Safe with Sunwing
article.lead: The ‘Safe with Sunwing’ commitment ensures the health and safety of Sunwing’s customers and employees throughout the entire vacation experience, so you can travel safe from takeoff to touchdown. They’re with you every step of the way, ensuring your travel safety from the moment you check-in at the airport to your flight, your airport transfer, your resort stay and your journey home. Safe travels!
